The view from my office window

13 Jul 2011

I have always loved Jesmond Dene more than any other part of Newcastle and I'm no so proud to have it as the view from the new home and home-office.Â I won't be getting bored of this anytime soon!

Not just on the grounds that it's a beautiful place, but it's also my cycling playground where I like to fall off my bike into mud. No really I seem to do that more than anything else there...
